Party Wiped Out if Protag Perishes
Restrict Number of Items You Can Have

You can't equip any defensive items,
so you'll have to make the most of
any spells, skills, or items that
can boost your survivability!

Will not receive experience points
from enemies whose level is lower
than your own! Target tougher
enemies to level up!
Special Skill MP consumption will\nbe doubled! Make it count!
The whole party will be wiped out if\nthe protagonist is defeated. Make\nsure you keep them nice and safe!

Enemies you encounter will be tougher
than usual, making your quest a true
test of your combat skills. Only
hardened warriors need apply!

You will no longer be able to run away from
enemies in all battles.
Let's make good use of
skills and her tools!

The tension consumption of all
special moves will be the maximum
value. Use it as your special trump
card in this particular situation.
There is a limit on the number of\nnon-material items you can carry.\nMake the most of your items!
